response.original_title: Für so etwas ist eine Frau nie zu alt
response.overview: An object of desire, which is never revealed, stirs up the friendship between a few older ladies. Olga supposedly has it, Millie finds the idea disturbing, and Erna's curiosity is piqued. Together with Millie, she decides to get to the bottom of the matter, and both invite themselves over to Olga's for coffee. A game of hide-and-seek begins. While Millie secretly searches the apartment, Erna listens to Olga's travel stories, unaware that her fun-loving friend can imagine exactly what is going on in her bedroom.
response.title: Für so etwas ist eine Frau nie zu alt
